DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate whether volume water administer NN9924 affect anatomical location ( stomach proximal small bowel ) tablet erosion .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacoscintigraphic Investigation NN9924 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Good general health Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.530.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Males willing use two acceptable form highly effective contraception Participation another clinical trial within 90 day Any chronic disorder severe disease Use GLP1 ( glucagonlike peptide1 ) agonists within 3 month precede dose Subjects smoker Subjects donate blood plasma past month excess 500 mL within 12 week precede screen
